verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You spread out the skies
over empty space,
said "Let there be light."
To a dark and formless world, Your light was born.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You spread out Your arms
over empty hearts,
said "Let there be light."
To a dark and hopeless world, Your Son was born.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
You made the world and saw that it was good.
You sent Your only Son for You are good.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
What a wonderful Maker.
What a wonderful Savior.
How majestic Your whispers,
And how humble Your love.
With a strength like no other,
And the heart of a Father,
How majestic Your whispers.
What a wonderful God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No eye has fully seen
how beautiful the cross, and we have only heard
the faintest whispers of how great You are. (2X)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
How majestic Your whispers.
What a wonderful God.
